XenotypeDef.label: husken
XenotypeDef.description:
The Huskens are a fearsome race of triceratops-like beings, covered in thick, armor-plated skin that offers excellent protection and insulation. They wield powerful natural weapons, with mace-like tails and sharp horns that make them lethal in combat. As an all-male species, they reproduce parasitically by implanting their young into large bovine creatures.
Living on a tidally locked planet where the habitable zone is in perpetual darkness, Huskens survive by consuming wood, breaking it down with their highly acidic saliva. They are naturally aggressive and domineering, embodying a brutal Iron Age warrior culture, and are renowned for their combat prowess. Refusing to wear clothing or armor due to their durable skin, they are nudists by nature, but their one critical weakness is poison gas, which can devastate even the strongest among them.
